articles.author: Joe Miller, Joshua Franklin
articles.title: 'Ultimate decider' on Jeffrey Epstein was JPMorgan's ex-top lawyer, says Jamie Dimon - Financial Times
articles.description: Bank’s chief executive testifies that former general counsel had ‘ability to override’ other executives
articles.content: Jamie Dimon has identified JPMorgan Chases former general counsel as the ultimate decider who had the authority to axe Jeffrey Epstein as a client, according to sworn testimony by the banks chief exe… [+4155 chars]
